subject: Re: [sugar] Read activity modifications
body:
On Wed, 2007-05-09 at 23:07 -0700, Don Hopkins wrote:
> I've been working on making the Read activity usable in book mode, and 
> adding other improvements.
> I'm updating it to work against the latest build, and I'll put up a tar 
> file soon.

Hello,

can you put it in a git module on dev.laptop.org instead of a tarball?

Thanks,
Marco
